_meta.description: WordPress site audit checklist for production readiness

categories.name: Formatting & SEO
categories.description: Search engine optimization and meta configuration

items.name: Declare Website Language
items.description: Set language_attributes() in HTML for translation tools, search ranking, and accessibility

items.name: SEO Plugin Installation
items.description: Install SEO plugin and complete open graph, title, description, and image fields

items.name: Meta Tags Verification
items.description: Validate meta tags are properly configured using online checkers

items.name: Broken Links Check
items.description: Identify and fix broken links, especially from slug changes

items.name: Favicon Configuration
items.description: Set site icon via Appearance > Customize > Site Identity for favicon and app icons

items.name: Responsive Design Testing
items.description: Ensure CSS media queries are used, zoom is enabled, and layout works on all devices

items.name: Search Engine Indexing
items.description: Verify WordPress isn't set to discourage search engine indexing

items.name: GZip Compression
items.description: Enable data compression to improve load times

items.name: Valid HTML Code
items.description: Run code through HTML validator and address significant errors

items.name: Image Optimization
items.description: Compress images, use WebP format, implement lazy loading

items.name: Webfont Optimization
items.description: Minimize font file sizes, use only needed styles, apply preconnect

items.name: Caching Implementation
items.description: Enable caching at server or plugin level

items.name: CDN Deployment
items.description: Distribute content globally from nearest server

items.name: HTTP Request Minimization
items.description: Reduce file quantity and size to lower request volume

items.name: Speed Testing
items.description: Run comprehensive speed audit to catch remaining issues

items.name: Sitemap Verification
items.description: Confirm XML sitemap exists at yourdomain.com/sitemap.xml

items.name: 404 Error Template
items.description: Design useful 404 page with search form, popular content, contact info

items.name: Search Page Creation
items.description: Build custom search template with /search slug

items.name: Color Contrast Verification
items.description: Test color combinations for accessibility and colorblind users

items.name: Keyboard Navigation
items.description: Verify all interactive elements are accessible via keyboard tabbing

items.name: Custom Form Element Accessibility
items.description: Ensure styled checkboxes/radio buttons remain keyboard accessible

items.name: Link Visual Distinction
items.description: Make links visually identifiable with underline or clear styling

items.name: Skip to Content Link
items.description: Implement skip-to-content link that displays on focus

items.name: Image Alt Text
items.description: Add descriptive alt attributes with context to all images

items.name: Accessibility Statement
items.description: Create statement explaining accessibility features and support options

items.name: Lighthouse Audit
items.description: Run comprehensive accessibility and performance audit

items.name: Email Deliverability Testing
items.description: Verify password reset and user registration emails send correctly

items.name: Form Functionality Testing
items.description: Confirm forms capture and submit data properly

items.name: Analytics Implementation
items.description: Set up website traffic tracking with GDPR/legal compliance

items.name: Privacy Policy Creation
items.description: Document what data is tracked, why, and user options

items.name: Search Tracking Setup
items.description: Monitor keywords and phrases driving visitors to site

items.name: Local Font Hosting
items.description: Host fonts locally to avoid sharing visitor IP with external services

items.name: SSL Certificate
items.description: Enable HTTPS encryption for site security

items.name: Regular Backups
items.description: Maintain scheduled backups stored off-site

items.name: WordPress Version Updates
items.description: Keep WordPress core updated to latest stable release

items.name: Admin Username Removal
items.description: Don't use 'admin' as username to prevent brute force attacks

items.name: Unused Theme/Plugin Deletion
items.description: Remove all inactive themes except one default and unused plugins

items.name: Theme & Plugin Updates
items.description: Keep all installed themes and plugins current

items.name: Strong Password Requirements
items.description: Use and enforce strong passwords for all user accounts

items.name: Login Attempt Limiting
items.description: Implement rate limiting on login attempts

items.name: Security Plugin Consideration
items.description: Evaluate need for dedicated security plugin
